tls:text.tls:line: (1) The king spoke thus:
(1) The king spoke thus:
“I tell you, elder leaders of the Shang, from the clans of …
“I tell you, elder leaders of the Shang, from the clans of …
as well as the elder Shang
as well as the elder Shang

sense.def: representatives of the past from N

tls:text.tls:line: officers of all ranks …
officers of all ranks …
and Grand Scribe Bi
and Minor Scribe Xi,
as well as all the active and
retired officials and honored people,
retired officials and honored people,
retired officials and honored people,
Respect this!
Respect this!

sense.def: warning; warnings; admonitions, words of advice
obey, show obedience to; act in accordance with (a demand) 不聽(with negation often with object omitted)

statements of opinion, proposal; public or formal utterance which commits the speaker; pronouncement; public or formal pronouncement, public or formal suggestion; Sometimes less specifically: proposal; what one says, speech; language; public proposal, public speech, words

tls:text.tls:line: “Ah, you multitudes.
“Ah, you multitudes.

sense.def: 爾眾"you my many servitors": you

tls:text.tls:line: “Ah, you multitudes.

sense.def: OBI etc: servitors; employees; workers, craftsmen

tls:text.tls:line: In my speech I do not dare to turn against the Heavenly Mandate;

sense.def: belonging to me (personally), my (often marked by the genitive particle 之)

sense.def: it is not as if N V-s; N by no means V-s

sense.def: have the temerity to; presume; venture to, have the audacity to (do something in front of a superior); make bold to; take the liberty of V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: In my speech I do not dare to turn against the Heavenly Mandate;

sense.def: 故訓匯纂 no. 70 顧命"disregard commands" turn one's head from> disregard

tls:text.tls:line: In my speech I do not dare to turn against the Heavenly Mandate;

sense.def: command from Heaven, heavenly decree (on any subject)

seg.line: 予來致上帝之威命明罰

tls:text.tls:srcline: 予來致上帝之威命明罰
tls:text.tls:line: I am going to execute Shangdi’s imposing command and perspicuous punishments.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 予來致上帝之威命明罰
tls:text.tls:line: I am going to execute Shangdi’s imposing command and perspicuous punishments.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 予來致上帝之威命明罰
tls:text.tls:line: I am going to execute Shangdi’s imposing command and perspicuous punishments.

sense.def: sacred, holy, of supernatural significance 明堂

tls:text.tls:srcline: 予來致上帝之威命明罰
tls:text.tls:line: I am going to execute Shangdi’s imposing command and perspicuous punishments.

sense.def: punishment through fines; more generally: punitive action

tls:text.tls:line: Today indeed I will for the first time give you my instructions.
Today indeed I will for the first time give you my instructions.
Respect them!
Respect them!
Respect them!
My speech
My speech
will indeed be a bright command from the first word to the last.”

sense.def: from (the beginning of an abstract series 自天子達於庶人

tls:text.tls:line: will indeed be a bright command from the first word to the last.”
will indeed be a bright command from the first word to the last.”
...will indeed be a bright command... [will be concerned to eludidate the Commands (of Heaven) that is all.

sense.def: early: elucidate the sacred content of; later: cast light on; clarify; elucidate, explain and proclaim;

tls:text.tls:line: ...will indeed be a bright command... [will be concerned to eludidate the Commands (of Heaven) that is all.
(3) The king said: “

sense.def: go on to say: "S" (with omitted subject)

tls:text.tls:line: In antiquity, Hou Ji,
on account of Shangdi’s words,
on account of Shangdi’s words,

sense.def: V only with N, V only by virtue of N; only N V-s

was able to seed all the kinds of grain
was able to seed all the kinds of grain

and accomplished Yu’s achievements.
and accomplished Yu’s achievements.
And indeed all the people in the world

tls:text.tls:line: And indeed all the people in the world
And indeed all the people in the world
And indeed all the people in the world

sense.def: Han usage: LH: all (NPs); also: any, as in He Yan on LY 1.2: 上謂凡在己上者

seg.line: 予惟以先王之道御復正爾

tls:text.tls:srcline: 予惟以先王之道御復正爾
tls:text.tls:line: I will then indeed according to the Way of the former kings lead a return to order.

sense.def: numinously, in a supernaturally efficacious way

tls:text.tls:line: to proclaim harmony

sense.def: announce; tell about (something); report on (something); pass on (information); announce (primarily to superiors, but occasionally also to respected inferiors or indeed to anyone at all), declare

sense.def: harmony; natural balance; cohesion; harmonious internal relations

tls:text.tls:line: by using this [grain of the Zhou for all their sacrificial proceedings,] made our Western Regions illustrious.

tls:text.tls:line: by using this [grain of the Zhou for all their sacrificial proceedings,] made our Western Regions illustrious.
(4) But now, [King] Zhou of Shang

tls:text.tls:line: (4) But now, [King] Zhou of Shang

sense.def: marker of new paragraph introducing a non-narrative new sequence, translatable by "now"

tls:text.tls:line: has put the world in disorder and despair,

sense.def: befuddle; confuse and create chaos in

tls:text.tls:line: has put the world in disorder and despair,
he has not made Shangdi illustrious,

sense.def: refuse to Vt the object N

tls:text.tls:line: he has not made Shangdi illustrious,

sense.def: cause to be illustrious; promote reputation of

sense.def: befuddle; confuse and create chaos in

sense.def: cruelly oppress; be recklessly violent against

tls:text.tls:line: he has exerted random violence against the nobleclans,
it has commanded my Accomplished Deceased Father, saying:
it has commanded my Accomplished Deceased Father, saying:
it has commanded my Accomplished Deceased Father, saying:
it has commanded my Accomplished Deceased Father, saying:

sense.def: issue a command/decree to the effect S; issue the imperative decree S

tls:text.tls:line: Since Shangdi has not been made illustrious,
‘Exterminate Shang’s great offender Zhou.’
‘Exterminate Shang’s great offender Zhou.’
(5) Therefore, I, the little son Fa, do not have the temerity to be oblivious to
(5) Therefore, I, the little son Fa, do not have the temerity to be oblivious to
completely conformed to Hou Ji’s governance,
completely conformed to Hou Ji’s governance,
completely conformed to Hou Ji’s governance,

sense.def: political administration as practised by N

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore, Shangdi said [to us]:
and therefore, Shangdi said [to us]:
‘You must attack him.’
executing Heaven’s great punishment by subduing [the Shang],
executing Heaven’s great punishment by subduing [the Shang],
executing Heaven’s great punishment by subduing [the Shang],

sense.def: archaic: punitive action; later, more narrowly: punishment through fines;

tls:text.tls:line: and accomplishing Shangdi’s reward,
I removed Zhou’s Mandate.
Respect this!

sense.def: show respectful attention to and obedience for!

tls:text.tls:line: Respect this!
Respect this!
the Heavenly Mandate. My Deceased Father
the Heavenly Mandate. My Deceased Father
(6) Earlier in our Western Regions,
in a speech of agreement,
I proclaimed to all that the noble clans of Shang were of no fault,
I proclaimed to all that the noble clans of Shang were of no fault,
I proclaimed to all that the noble clans of Shang were of no fault,

sense.def: all ways of, all the various varieties of

tls:text.tls:line: that it was indeed only this one man [King Zhou].
that it was indeed only this one man [King Zhou].
I have already killed Zhou
I have already killed Zhou
I have already killed Zhou

sense.def: conduct a demonstrative execution for a monstrous crime

tls:text.tls:line: and received the Heavenly Mandate.
and received the Heavenly Mandate.

sense.def: command from Heaven, heavenly decree (on any subject)

tls:text.tls:line: I am furthermore going to make this Mandate propitious.

sense.def: I (personally); I personally; I, as a matter of personal experience or sensibility 予欲 "I wish..."

tls:text.tls:line: I am furthermore going to make this Mandate propitious.
I am furthermore going to make this Mandate propitious.

sense.def: cause to come; attract to one; bring in

you great leaders of the states,

sense.def: should never; don't verb any object

sense.def: have the temerity to; presume; venture to, have the audacity to (do something in front of a superior); make bold to; take the liberty of V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: and seek audiences with us, the Zhou.

sense.def: to be received in audience (to be pronounced as xiàn in this usage?)

tls:text.tls:line: And today I indeed clearly declare to you,

sense.def: lucidly; explicitly; openly, clearly; perfectly clearly 明知

tls:text.tls:line: I have already overtaken from … [King] Zhou

sense.def: will most certainly; surely, certainly, according to reasonable expectations

tls:text.tls:line: I have already overtaken from … [King] Zhou

sense.def: go ahead to, go out to; go ahead and act; go on to act in the future; proceed to do what one is supposed to do

tls:text.tls:line: I have already overtaken from … [King] Zhou

sense.def: go after, pursue, try to catch up with (and perhaps catch)

tls:text.tls:line: The Heavenly King has the Mandate.

sense.def: the king by the grace of Heaven, His Heaven-ordained Majesty

tls:text.tls:line: And you noble clans and honored people want to continue your posterity.
we will not order you noble clans around without [prior] declarations.

sense.def: have no one to turn to (for support)

tls:text.tls:line: we will not order you noble clans around without [prior] declarations.

sense.def: cause N to V, get (someone) to (do something);

tls:text.tls:line: we will not order you noble clans around without [prior] declarations.
we will not order you noble clans around without [prior] declarations.
The Western Regions are suffering and exhausted;

sense.def: tired out by diligent effort; be stressed; feel strained

tls:text.tls:line: The Western Regions are suffering and exhausted;
I would not reprieve if [we do not love you in any way, (and indeed) CH]

sense.def: pre-classical pronoun, here in the function similar to the classic 所

tls:text.tls:line: each one, out of respect,
each one, out of respect,
each one, out of respect,

sense.def: on one's own accord; oneself, in person; by oneself (Perhaps this should be npro V[PRED]. I do not know how one would argue one way or the other.]

tls:text.tls:line: ought to help ensure that Heaven eternally blesses our Western Regions.

sense.def: bring good luck to; send blessings to

tls:text.tls:line: ought to help ensure that Heaven eternally blesses our Western Regions.

sense.def: to help (somebody or something) to do something

tls:text.tls:line: ought to help ensure that Heaven eternally blesses our Western Regions.

sense.def: forever; permanently; for a fairly long time; all the time
officer in charge of the administration of legal affairs
